name: curl
description: CLI wrapper around node-libcurl. Have easy curl without installing binaries.

scripts.posttest: (istanbul check-coverage --statements 90 --branches 90 --functions 100 --lines 90 && rm -rf coverage) || echo Look at 'coverage/lcov-report/index.html' to find out more

author: Robert Jefe Lindstaedt <robert.lindstaedt@gmail.com>
